positions.subtitle: Chiratae Ventures (Formerly IDG Ventures India)
positions.description: Launched in 2006, Chiratae Ventures (formerly IDG Ventures India) is India's leading tech VC managing $950m+.  Chiratae believes in leading investments in companies with a strong technology foundation and the ability to solve problems endemic to India. It has done 100+ investments and has 40% portfolio scaled globally. Some of our investments include Myntra, Flipkart, Lenskart, Curefit, Policybazaar, FirstCry, Newgen (NSE: NEWGEN), Yatra (NASDAQ: YTRA) among others.
positions.title: Product Manager | Investment Associate
positions.description_html:
Launched in 2006, Chiratae Ventures (formerly IDG Ventures India) is India's leading tech VC managing $950m+. Chiratae believes in leading investments in companies with a strong technology foundation and the ability to solve problems endemic to India. It has done 100+ investments and has 40% portfolio scaled globally.

Some of our investments include Myntra, Flipkart, Lenskart, Curefit, Policybazaar, FirstCry, Newgen (NSE: NEWGEN), Yatra (NASDAQ: YTRA) among others.
